Dear Krishna,

 

Hope all is well.

 

As per the below approval from Tracey and as aligned with Arno, appreciate if you can forward the latest audited consolidated financials you have in hand for the Chalhoub parent company, Chalhoub Group Limited, to the below contacts from our pre-screened insurance brokers.

 

This is required to request quotations for a Directors and Officers Insurance policy for the group.

 

*	Ace Gallagher Insurance Brokers:            Khaled Abu Reslan (e-mail: kreslan@ace-gallagher.com <mailto:kreslan@ace-gallagher.com> )
*	NASCO Insurance Brokers:                       Ashok Eapen (e-mail: Ashok.Eapen@nascodubai.com <mailto:Ashok.Eapen@nascodubai.com> )

 

Please do not include me in copy when forwarding the audited financials to the above individuals. Also, NDAs are duly signed with the mentioned brokers.

 

Appreciate your kind support.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: Friday, 13 October 2023 3:10 PM
To: Tracey Griffin <Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com <mailto:Tracey.Griffin@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Nada Boutros <Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com <mailto:Nada.Boutros@chalhoub.com> >; Jerry Lorilla <Jerry.Lorilla@chalhoub.com <mailto:Jerry.Lorilla@chalhoub.com> >; Arno Gruner <Arno.Gruner@chalhoub.com <mailto:Arno.Gruner@chalhoub.com> >; Joe Hobeika <Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com <mailto:Joe.Hobeika@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Directors and Officers Insurance

 

Dear Tracey,

I hope you are doing well. I have been approached by Nada Boutros to look into arranging Directors and Officers Insurance (D&O) for the Chalhoub Group advisory board members.

The D&O insurance policy serves the following purposes:

I hope you are doing well. I have been approached by Nada Boutros to look into arranging Directors and Officers Insurance (D&O) for the Chalhoub Group advisory board members.

The D&O insurance policy serves the following purposes:

The D&O insurance policy serves the following purposes:

*	It directly protects individual directors and officers by covering legal defense costs and settlements for alleged wrongful acts, such as mismanagement, negligence, or breaches of fiduciary duties.
*	It can reimburse the organization for any costs incurred while protecting its directors and officers against allegations of mismanagement, negligence, or breaches of fiduciary duties.
*	D&O Insurance covers expenses related to investigations into alleged wrongful acts, including regulatory inquiries by government agencies.
*	It also provides coverage for legal actions brought by minority shareholders on behalf of the company (derivative suits) against directors and officers for alleged mismanagement, ensuring that defense costs and any settlements or judgments are covered.
*	This insurance safeguards the personal assets of directors and officers, which may be at risk if they are personally held liable in lawsuits related to their corporate roles.
*	It's important to note that the policy extends to cover all managers within the group for suits brought by even employees for alleged wrongful termination, discrimination, or harassment, for all companies where Chalhoub's parent company has a majority ownership.
*	Overall, D&O Insurance is primarily designed to protect both individuals leading an organization and the organization itself from the financial burdens associated with legal actions and claims arising from their leadership roles.

*	It directly protects individual directors and officers by covering legal defense costs and settlements for alleged wrongful acts, such as mismanagement, negligence, or breaches of fiduciary duties.
*	It can reimburse the organization for any costs incurred while protecting its directors and officers against allegations of mismanagement, negligence, or breaches of fiduciary duties.
*	D&O Insurance covers expenses related to investigations into alleged wrongful acts, including regulatory inquiries by government agencies.
*	It also provides coverage for legal actions brought by minority shareholders on behalf of the company (derivative suits) against directors and officers for alleged mismanagement, ensuring that defense costs and any settlements or judgments are covered.
*	This insurance safeguards the personal assets of directors and officers, which may be at risk if they are personally held liable in lawsuits related to their corporate roles.
*	It's important to note that the policy extends to cover all managers within the group for suits brought by even employees for alleged wrongful termination, discrimination, or harassment, for all companies where Chalhoub's parent company has a majority ownership.
*	Overall, D&O Insurance is primarily designed to protect both individuals leading an organization and the organization itself from the financial burdens associated with legal actions and claims arising from their leadership roles.

The reason for this email is that the insurer requires audited financials of the parent company, Chalhoub Group Limited, which is likely sensitive information. To proceed, we have requested non-disclosure agreements (NDAs) to be signed by the brokers (attached) who will be tasked to provide competitive quotations. I require your approval to share the last year’s audited financial information only with the insurance brokers with whom the NDAs are signed.

Kindly note that without audited financials, no reputable insurer can provide a quotation for a Director's & Officers policy. As a note, the purpose insurers require audited financials for D&O insurance policies is to assess the financial stability and risk profile of the company seeking coverage.

To limit the number of people having access to the audited financials, I can connect our treasury to the chosen insurance brokers directly to limit the access of the information only to bare minimum of individuals involved.

Appreciate if you can advise your direction in order to proceed accordingly.

Best Regards,

Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​
